queries.hql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS dw.dim_tcms_city ( city_id int, city_country_code string, city_state_code string, city_enname string, city_cnname string, city_tms_id int, city_last_update_time timestamp ) COMMENT '城市维度表' STORED AS PARQUET TBLPROPERTIES('parquet.compression'='SNAPPY')

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS dw.dim_tcms_customer ( og_key string, customer_id int, customer_code string, customer_shortname string, customer_allname string, customer_customerstatus_code string, customer_customerlevel_code string, customer_customertype_code string, customer_customersource_code string COMMENT '客户介绍人类型代码，S内部介绍、C自行寻找 、P平台介绍', customer_customersource_code_val string, customer_settlementtypes_code string COMMENT '结算模式，M月结，W周结', customer_settlementtypes_code_val string, customer_createdate timestamp, customer_createrid int, customer_server_status string, customer_og_id int, customer_tms_id int, customer_start_time timestamp, customer_sameday_time timestamp COMMENT '当天客户走货时间', customer_owe_intercept string COMMENT '欠费拦截字段（对应值 Y,是欠费拦截，N 否）', customer_owe_intercept_val string, customer_owe_type string COMMENT '欠费类型（YE 余额模式、ZQ 账期模式）', customer_owe_type_val string, customer_owe_intercept_date timestamp COMMENT '欠费放行最后日期', customer_pcs_code string COMMENT '客户来源,对应xtd_potentialcustomersource.pcs_code', customer_last_update_time timestamp, customer_orderreturnhandledays string COMMENT '原件退回处理天数', customer_pickuppieces int COMMENT '自提件最少件数', customer_orderabnormalhandledays int COMMENT '异常件处理天数', customer_billcompany_id int COMMENT '账单主体ID', customer_bill_format int COMMENT '账单格式' ) COMMENT '客户维度表' STORED AS PARQUET TBLPROPERTIES('parquet.compression'='SNAPPY')

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS dw.dim_tcms_product ( product_code string, product_cnname string COMMENT '中文名称', product_enname string COMMENT '英文名称', product_productgroup_code string COMMENT '产品组，表示本产品属于何种业务，例如小包单票、出口快件类等', product_currency_code string COMMENT '设置收费币种', product_status string COMMENT '生效状态，Y为生效、N为失效', product_status_val string, product_trackstatus string COMMENT '是否可跟踪(TRACK)，N为不可跟踪、Y为可跟踪', product_trackstatus_val string, product_aging string COMMENT '派送时效', product_note string COMMENT '网站备注', product_tms_id int, product_print_sign string COMMENT '标签打印标记', product_test_sort int COMMENT '运费试算排序权重, 数值越大排在上面', product_carrier_name string COMMENT '平台承运商', product_operational_difficulty decimal(12,2) COMMENT '操作难度系数', product_package_weight decimal(12,2) COMMENT '包材重', product_audit_sku_sign string COMMENT '是否需检查SKU报关审核标志，Y为校验，N为不校验', product_audit_sku_sign_val string, product_ispanasonicunit string COMMENT '是否为国际件 Y为是 N为否', product_ispanasonicunit_val string, product_last_update_time timestamp, product_isvirtual int COMMENT '是否是虚拟海外仓 1为是 0为否', product_isvirtual_val string, product_original_server_code string COMMENT '原服务商代码', product_original_server_channelid int COMMENT '原服务渠道ID',
product_productgroup_cnname string, product_productgroup_enname string, product_productgroup_note string, product_productgroup_hawbrule string COMMENT '服务商单号规则样例表', product_productgroup_last_update_time timestamp ) COMMENT '产品维度表' STORED AS PARQUET TBLPROPERTIES('parquet.compression'='SNAPPY')

hql.discription: 客户问题管理配置维度表表

queries.hql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS dw.dim_tcms_issue_type ( issue_type_tms_id int COMMENT '系统ID', issue_type_issuekind_code string COMMENT '问题种类代码', issue_type_issuekind_cnname string COMMENT '问题标题，用于网站客户显示与问题管理中显示', issue_type_issuekind_content string COMMENT '问题内容模板', issue_type_isu_interactionsign string COMMENT '网站处理类型，一般为可回复，不可回复和可网上放行', issue_type_issue_enable string COMMENT '是否可用 Y可用 N不可用', issue_type_issue_enable_val string, issue_type_issue_class_code string COMMENT '问题紧急等级', issue_type_issuekind_mnemonic string, issue_type_issuekind_link string COMMENT '问题类型环节，比如签入，录单等， 多个环节用逗号分割，', issue_type_last_update_time timestamp ) COMMENT '客户问题管理配置表' STORED AS PARQUET TBLPROPERTIES('parquet.compression'='SNAPPY')

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS dw.dim_employee ( ed_key string, ep_key string, employee_id int, employee_code string, employee_company_code string, employee_is_admin tinyint, employee_password string, employee_name string, employee_name_en string, employee_status tinyint, employee_status_val string, employee_email string, employee_email_verify tinyint, employee_ud_id int, employee_up_id int, employee_password_update_time timestamp, employee_phone string, employee_mobile_phone string, employee_note string, employee_supervisor_id int, employee_add_time timestamp, employee_last_login timestamp, employee_update_time timestamp, employee_activate_code string, employee_is_index_show tinyint, employee_versions timestamp, employee_p_id int, employee_ez_user_id int, employee_priority_login string ) COMMENT '员工维度表' STORED AS PARQUET TBLPROPERTIES('parquet.compression'='SNAPPY')

CREATE TABLE if NOT EXISTS dw.dim_warehouse( warehouse_id int comment '仓库ID', warehouse_code string comment '仓库编号', warehouse_desc string comment '仓库名称', warehouse_type tinyint comment '参考类型', warehouse_type_val string comment '参考类型说明', warehouse_status tinyint comment '仓库状态', warehouse_status_val string comment '仓库状态说明', warehouse_virtual tinyint comment '仓库运营方式(自营或者第三方)', warehouse_virtual_val string comment '仓库运营方式说明', warehouse_transfer tinyint comment '仓库中转状态(标准or中转)', warehouse_transfer_val string comment '仓库中转状态说明', warehouse_country_id int comment '仓库所属国家id', warehouse_country_code string comment '仓库所属国家编码', warehouse_state string comment '仓库所在州', warehouse_city string comment '仓库所在城市', warehouse_contacter string comment '仓库联系人', warehouse_company string comment '仓库所属公司', warehouse_phone_no string comment '仓库电话', warehouse_street_address1 string comment '仓库地址1', warehouse_street_address2 string comment '仓库地址2', warehouse_street_number string comment '仓库门牌号', warehouse_postcode string comment '仓库邮编', warehouse_proxy_code string comment '仓库代理人编号', warehouse_timezone int comment '时区', warehouse_is_value_added_tax tinyint comment '是否开启增值税审核 0 否 1是', warehouse_is_value_added_tax_val string comment '是否开启增值税审核的说明', warehouse_en string comment '仓库英文名字', warehouse_saving_time tinyint comment '令时: 1为夏令时,0为冬令时', warehouse_saving_time_val string comment '令时显示值说明', warehouse_arrival_days int comment '预计到达仓库的天数', warehouse_currency_code string comment '币种代码', warehouse_add_time timestamp, warehouse_update_time timestamp )COMMENT '仓库维度表' STORED AS PARQUET TBLPROPERTIES('parquet.compression'='SNAPPY')

CREATE TABLE if NOT EXISTS dw.dim_warehouse_physical( warehouse_key string, wp_id int comment '物理仓id', wp_warehouse_id int comment '关联仓库ID', wp_warehouse_code string comment '仓库编号(仓库)', wp_name string comment '物理仓名称', wp_code string comment '物理仓代码', wp_status tinyint comment '状态 0不可用 1可用', wp_status_val string comment '状态说明', wp_priority tinyint comment '出口优先级 最多2位数', wp_state string comment '州 省份', wp_city string comment '城市', wp_postcode string comment '邮编', wp_company string comment '公司名称', wp_contacter string comment '联系人', wp_phone string comment '电话', wp_street_address1 string comment '地址1', wp_street_address2 string comment '地址2', wp_street_number string comment '门牌号', wp_add_time timestamp, wp_update_time timestamp )COMMENT '物理仓维度表' STORED AS PARQUET TBLPROPERTIES('parquet.compression'='SNAPPY')

CREATE TABLE if NOT EXISTS dw.dim_warehouse_area( warehouse_key string, wa_id int comment '分区id', wa_code string comment '分区代码', wa_warehouse_id int comment '仓库ID', wa_warehouse_code string comment '仓库编号', wa_wp_code string comment '物理仓代码', wa_name string comment '分区名称', wa_name_en string comment '分区英文名', wa_type tinyint comment '分区类型', wa_type_val string comment '分区类型说明', wa_pc_id int, wa_status tinyint comment '分区状态', wa_status_val string comment '分区状态说明', wa_sort tinyint comment '预下架顺序,拣货顺序，1优先级最高', wa_add_time timestamp, wa_update_time timestamp )COMMENT '仓库分区维度表' STORED AS PARQUET TBLPROPERTIES('parquet.compression'='SNAPPY')

CREATE TABLE if NOT EXISTS dw.dim_warehouse_location( warehouse_key string, wa_key string, wp_key string, wlc_id Int, wlc_code String, wlc_note String, wlc_status Int, wlc_status_val string, wlc_warehouse_id Int, wlc_wp_code String, wlc_lt_id String, wlc_lt_code String, wlc_lock Int, wlc_wa_code String, wlc_sort Int, wlc_classify Int, wlc_classify_val String, wlc_level Int, wlc_level_val String, wlc_pick_point Int, wlc_pick_sort Int, wlc_add_time Timestamp, wlc_update_time Timestamp, wlc_contain_battery Int, wlc_contain_battery_val String, wlc_putaway_sort Int, wlc_is_mixed Int, wlc_is_mixed_val String, wlc_is_multiple_batch Int, wlc_is_multiple_batch_val String, wlc_max_weight Int, wlc_max_sku_type Int, wlc_roadway String, wlc_row_col String, wlc_column_col String, wlc_tier String, wlc_direction_indicator String, wlc_direction_indicator_val string, wlc_roadway_add_time Timestamp, wlc_timestamp Timestamp, wlc_lt_description String, wlc_lt_width decimal(8,2), wlc_lt_length decimal(8,2), wlc_lt_height decimal(8,2), wlc_lt_vol decimal(10,2) )COMMENT '库位维度表' STORED AS PARQUET TBLPROPERTIES('parquet.compression'='SNAPPY')

CREATE TABLE if NOT EXISTS dw.dim_currency( currency_id int comment '货币id', currency_name_en string comment '货币英文名', currency_name string comment '货币中文名', currency_code string comment '货币编码', currency_is_local tinyint comment '是否当地货币', currency_is_local_val string comment '是否当地货币说明', currency_symbol_left string comment '左侧货币符号', currency_symbol_right string comment '右侧货币符号', currency_decimal_point string comment '货币小数点符号', currency_thousands_point string comment '货币千分位符号', currency_decimal_places int comment '货币小数位位置', currency_hs_code string comment '历史货币编号', currency_official_rate decimal(8,4) comment '货币官方汇率', currency_rate decimal(8,4) comment '货币汇率', currency_rmb_buy decimal(11,4) comment '人民币买入价格', currency_rmb_sales decimal(11,4) comment '人民币卖出价格', currency_update_time timestamp )COMMENT '币种维度表' STORED AS PARQUET TBLPROPERTIES('parquet.compression'='SNAPPY')

CREATE TABLE if NOT EXISTS dw.dim_country( country_id Int comment '国家id', country_name String comment '国家名称', country_name_en String comment '国家英文名', country_local_name String comment '国家当地名称', country_alias String comment '国家别名', country_code String comment '国家编号', country_sort Int comment '国家排序', country_short_name String comment '国家简称', country_trade_country String comment '贸易国家', country_num String comment '国家number', country_zipcode_substring_length Int comment '邮政编码', country_cellphone_area_code Int comment '区号' )COMMENT '国家维度表' STORED AS PARQUET TBLPROPERTIES('parquet.compression'='SNAPPY')

CREATE TABLE if NOT EXISTS dw.par_currency_rate( cr_datekey string comment '货币日期', cr_currency_code string comment '货币代码', cr_currency_rate decimal(18,4) comment '货币汇率', cr_former_currency_rate decimal(18,4) comment '原先货币汇率', cr_user_id int comment '维护人id', cr_add_time timestamp comment '新增时间', cr_end_time timestamp comment '结束时间', w_insert_dt timestamp, w_update_dt timestamp )COMMENT '币种费率配置表,每日更新一次' STORED AS PARQUET TBLPROPERTIES('parquet.compression'='SNAPPY')

CREATE TABLE if NOT EXISTS dw.par_search_filter( sf_id Int, warehouse_id Int, parent_id Int, search_label String, search_label_en String, search_label_ru String, search_value String, search_sort Int, filter_action_id Int, search_tips String, search_input_id String, sf_desc String )COMMENT '参数查询配置表' STORED AS PARQUET TBLPROPERTIES('parquet.compression'='SNAPPY')

CREATE TABLE if NOT EXISTS dw.dim_zone( zs_key string, zone_id Int, zone_zs_id Int, zone_name String, zone_name_en String, zone_code String, zone_sort Int, zone_note String, zone_update_time Timestamp )COMMENT '分区表' STORED AS PARQUET TBLPROPERTIES('parquet.compression'='SNAPPY')

CREATE TABLE if NOT EXISTS dw.dim_zone_scheme( zs_id Int, zs_status Int, zs_name String, zs_name_en String, zs_pg_code String, zs_sm_code String, zs_sc_id Int, zs_creator_id Int, zs_modify_id Int, zs_note String, zs_add_time Timestamp, zs_update_time Timestamp, zs_is_oda Int, zs_is_oda_val string )COMMENT '分区方案表' STORED AS PARQUET TBLPROPERTIES('parquet.compression'='SNAPPY')

CREATE TABLE if NOT EXISTS dw.dim_server( server_id Int, server_code String, server_name String, server_contact_name String, server_contact_phone String, server_address String, server_settlement_type Int, server_settlement_type_val string, server_balance decimal(10,3), server_currency_code String, server_tax decimal(10,3), server_person_user Int, server_update_date Timestamp, server_type Int, server_is_ignore_express Int, server_as_id Int, server_as_name string, server_add_date Timestamp, server_status Int, server_status_val string, server_ap_id Int, server_carrier_name String, server_cancel_label_flag Int, server_is_cancel_label_flag_val string )COMMENT '服务商表' STORED AS PARQUET TBLPROPERTIES('parquet.compression'='SNAPPY')

CREATE TABLE if NOT EXISTS dw.dim_server_channel( server_key string, server_channel_id Int, server_channel_server_id Int, server_channel_code String, server_channel_short_name String, server_channel_name String, server_channel_name_en String, server_channel_note String, server_channel_status Int, server_channel_status_val string, server_channel_is_weighing Int, server_channel_is_weighing_val string, server_channel_is_tracking Int, server_channel_is_tracking_val string, server_channel_is_volume Int, server_channel_is_volume_val string, server_channel_st_id Int, server_channel_st_auto_delivery Int, server_channel_st_split_start Int, server_channel_st_split_value Int, server_channel_st_split_type String, server_channel_add_time Timestamp, server_channel_update_time Timestamp, server_channel_asp_id Int, server_channel_asp_code String, server_channel_apm_id Int, server_channel_api_pk_type String, server_channel_wut_code String, server_channel_min_weight decimal(11,3), server_channel_max_weight decimal(11,3), server_channel_is_validate_address Int, server_channel_is_validate_address_val string, server_channel_is_pack_weighing Int, server_channel_is_pack_weighing_val string, server_channel_sign_type Int, server_channel_right_trim_length Int, server_channel_left_trim_length Int, server_channel_is_mark_weight Int, server_channel_is_mark_weight_val string, server_channel_push_tms_status Int )COMMENT '服务商渠道表' STORED AS PARQUET TBLPROPERTIES('parquet.compression'='SNAPPY')

CREATE TABLE if NOT EXISTS dw.dim_tcms_server( organization_key string, server_id Int, server_code String, server_shortname String, server_allname String, server_statuscode String, server_statuscode_val string, server_levelcode String, server_typecode String, server_settlement_typescode String, server_settlement_typescode_val string, server_createdate Timestamp, server_createrid Int, server_og_id Int, server_tms_id Int, server_manifast_id Int, server_bag_rule String, server_bag_custom_lable_id String, server_last_update_time Timestamp )COMMENT '转运服务商表' STORED AS PARQUET TBLPROPERTIES('parquet.compression'='SNAPPY')

CREATE TABLE if NOT EXISTS dw.dim_tcms_server_channel( server_key string, server_channel_id Int, server_channel_server_id Int, server_channel_formal_code String, server_channel_server_product_code String, server_channel_cnname String, server_channel_enname String, server_channel_srname String, server_channel_servicer_id Int, server_channel_enable String, server_channel_enable_val string, server_channel_tms_id Int, server_channel_server_remark String, server_channel_is_support_forcerelease Int, server_channel_is_support_forcerelease_val string, server_channel_is_api_return_label Int, server_channel_is_api_return_label_val string, server_channel_is_api_return_trackNum Int, server_channel_is_api_return_trackNum_val string, server_channel_sort_code String, server_channel_single_number_intercept_rules String, server_channel_package_weight Int, server_channel_server_forecast_product_code String, server_channel_last_update_time Timestamp, server_channel_is_multi Int, server_channel_chargemode String, server_channel_childMinAmount decimal(9,2), server_channel_is_api_cancel_result string, server_channel_lms_is_bill Int, server_channel_lms_is_bill_val string, server_channel_lms_channel_code String )COMMENT '服务商渠道表' STORED AS PARQUET TBLPROPERTIES('parquet.compression'='SNAPPY')

CREATE TABLE if NOT EXISTS dw.dim_tcms_work_group( wgp_id Int, wgp_tms_id Int, wgp_structurecode String, wgp_shortname String, wgp_worktype String, wgp_worktype_name String, wgp_worktype_ename String, wgp_worktype_note String, wgp_last_update_time Timestamp )COMMENT '员工业务分组表' STORED AS PARQUET TBLPROPERTIES('parquet.compression'='SNAPPY')

CREATE TABLE if NOT EXISTS dw.dim_tcms_zone( zs_key string, zone_zs_id Int, zone_id Int, zone_sort String, zone_code String, zone_zn_name String, zone_zn_ename String, zone_zn_note String, zone_last_update_time Timestamp )COMMENT '转运分区表' STORED AS PARQUET TBLPROPERTIES('parquet.compression'='SNAPPY')

CREATE TABLE if NOT EXISTS dw.dim_tcms_zone_scheme( zs_id Int, zs_name String, zs_ss_code String, zs_pg_code String, zs_sn_id Int, zs_st_id_create Int, zs_createdate Timestamp, zs_st_id_modify Int, zs_modifydate Timestamp, zs_note String, zs_tms_id Int, zs_last_update_time Timestamp )COMMENT '分区方案表' STORED AS PARQUET TBLPROPERTIES('parquet.compression'='SNAPPY')

CREATE TABLE if NOT EXISTS dw.par_tcms_work_groupmember( st_key string, wgp_key string, gp_gn_id Int, gp_tms_id Int, gp_structurecode String, gp_shortname String, gp_worktype String, gp_worktype_name String, gp_st_id Int, gp_st_name string, gp_gm_shipperquota Int, gp_leader String, gp_id Int, gp_last_update_time Timestamp )COMMENT '员工分组对照关系表' STORED AS PARQUET TBLPROPERTIES('parquet.compression'='SNAPPY')

CREATE TABLE if NOT EXISTS dw.dim_tcms_currency( currency_id Int, currency_name_en String, currency_name String, currency_code String, currency_is_local Int, currency_is_local_val string, currency_symbol_left String, currency_symbol_right String, currency_decimal_point String, currency_thousands_point String, currency_decimal_places Int, currency_hs_code String, currency_official_rate decimal(8,4), currency_rate decimal(8,4), currency_update_time Timestamp )COMMENT '转运币别表' STORED AS PARQUET TBLPROPERTIES('parquet.compression'='SNAPPY')

CREATE TABLE if NOT EXISTS dw.dim_tcms_organization( organization_id Int, organization_tms_id Int, organization_rightcode String, organization_shortcode String, organization_type String, organization_type_cnname string, organization_name String, organization_ename String, organization_enable String, organization_id_farther Int, organization_citycnname String, organization_cityenname String, organization_chargingpoint String, organization_firstcharge_og_id Int, organization_chargesecond_og_id Int, organization_estimatecost_og_id Int, organization_address String, organization_contact String, organization_phone String, organization_telephone String, organization_email String, organization_faxno String, organization_last_update_time Timestamp, organization_country_code String, organization_ck_code String, organization_charge_address_id Int )COMMENT '组织表' STORED AS PARQUET TBLPROPERTIES('parquet.compression'='SNAPPY')

CREATE TABLE if NOT EXISTS dw.par_val_list( row_wid string, datasource_num_id string, vl_type string, vl_value string, vl_name string, vl_bi_name string, vl_datasource_table string, vl_memo string, w_insert_dt timestamp, w_update_dt timestamp ) STORED BY 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.hbase.HBaseStorageHandler' WITH SERDEPROPERTIES ("hbase.columns.mapping" = ":key ,list:datasource_num_id ,list:vl_type ,list:vl_value ,list:vl_name ,list:vl_bi_name ,list:vl_datasource_table ,list:vl_memo ,list:w_insert_dt ,list:w_update_dt") TBLPROPERTIES("hbase.table.name" = "par_val_list")

CREATE TABLE if NOT EXISTS dw.par_holiday( row_wid string, warehouse_code string, holiday_date timestamp, holiday_type int, holiday_type_val string, holiday_memo string, w_insert_dt timestamp, w_update_dt timestamp ) STORED BY 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.hbase.HBaseStorageHandler' WITH SERDEPROPERTIES ("hbase.columns.mapping" = ":key ,holiday:warehouse_code ,holiday:holiday_date ,holiday:holiday_type ,holiday:holiday_type_val ,holiday:holiday_memo ,holiday:w_insert_dt ,holiday:w_update_dt") TBLPROPERTIES("hbase.table.name" = "par_holiday")

CREATE TABLE if NOT EXISTS dw.par_timezone( row_wid string, warehouse_code string, warehouse_name string, timezone_year int, timezone_season_type string, timezone_season_start timestamp, timezone_season_end timestamp, timezone_summer_time_dif_val int, timezone_winner_time_dif_val int, timezone_summer_number int, timezone_winner_number int, timezone_number int, timezone_memo string, w_insert_dt timestamp, w_update_dt timestamp ) STORED BY 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.hbase.HBaseStorageHandler' WITH SERDEPROPERTIES ("hbase.columns.mapping" = ":key ,timezone:warehouse_code ,timezone:warehouse_name ,timezone:timezone_year ,timezone:timezone_season_type ,timezone:timezone_season_start ,timezone:timezone_season_end ,timezone:timezone_summer_time_dif_val ,timezone:timezone_winner_time_dif_val ,timezone:timezone_summer_number ,timezone:timezone_winner_number ,timezone:timezone_number ,timezone:timezone_memo ,timezone:w_insert_dt ,timezone:w_update_dt") TBLPROPERTIES("hbase.table.name" = "par_timezone")

CREATE TABLE if NOT EXISTS dw.par_datasource_list( datasource_num_id string, datasource string, datasource_short_name string, database_name string, w_insert_dt timestamp, w_update_dt timestamp ) STORED BY 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.hbase.HBaseStorageHandler' WITH SERDEPROPERTIES ("hbase.columns.mapping" = ":key ,datasoure_list:datasource ,datasoure_list:datasource_short_name ,datasoure_list:database_name ,datasoure_list:w_insert_dt ,datasoure_list:w_update_dt") TBLPROPERTIES("hbase.table.name" = "par_datasource_list")

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS dw.dim_fee_type ( ft_id int, ft_code string, ft_name_en string, ft_name_cn string, ft_note string, ft_type int COMMENT '1:操作费 2:物流杂费 3:物流特殊费用 4:应收', ft_type_val string, ft_add_time timestamp, ft_update_time timestamp ) COMMENT '费用类型维度表' STORED AS PARQUET TBLPROPERTIES('parquet.compression'='SNAPPY')

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS dw.dim_tcms_fee_type ( ft_fk_id int COMMENT 'ft_id', ft_tms_id int COMMENT '系统ID', ft_fk_code string COMMENT '费用代码', ft_fk_name string COMMENT '中文名称', ft_fk_ename string COMMENT '英文名称', ft_fk_note string COMMENT '备注', ft_fk_type string COMMENT '费用类型. Y:表示燃油费', ft_fk_type_val string COMMENT '', ft_group_id int COMMENT '分组ID', ft_last_update_time timestamp COMMENT 'gc_tcms_xtd_customer_feekind的时间戳', ft_serverbill_printed string COMMENT '对应服务商对账单详情列', ft_group_code string COMMENT '费用代码', ft_group_name string COMMENT '中文名称', ft_group_ename string COMMENT '英文名称', ft_group_remark string COMMENT '备注', ft_group_tms_id int COMMENT '系统ID', ft_group_last_update_time timestamp COMMENT 'gc_tcms_xtd_customer_feekind_group的最后修改时间' ) COMMENT '费用类型维度表' STORED AS PARQUET TBLPROPERTIES('parquet.compression'='SNAPPY')

CREATE TABLE if not exists dw.dim_tcms_country( country_code string, country_cnname string, country_enname string, country_three_code string, country_number string, country_last_update_time timestamp ) STORED AS PARQUET TBLPROPERTIES('parquet.compression'='SNAPPY');

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS dw.dim_tcms_employee ( employee_st_id int COMMENT '员工ID，每个员工为唯一值，在职期间不变。', employee_st_code string COMMENT '工号。系统内部保持唯一，一般不变动', employee_vs_code string COMMENT '员工在职状态代码', employee_og_id int COMMENT '员工所属组织机构ID', employee_competence_og_id int, employee_st_name string COMMENT '员工姓名', employee_st_ename string COMMENT '员工英文姓名', employee_ur_loginpassword string COMMENT '用户密码', employee_sp_id int COMMENT '岗位ID', employee_st_id_ctreate int COMMENT '创建人ID', employee_tms_id int COMMENT '系统ID', employee_error_count int COMMENT '验证码错误次数（超过五次则需等待3小时）', employee_last_obtain_time timestamp COMMENT '下次获取验证码时间', employee_last_update_time timestamp ) COMMENT 'tcms员工维度表' STORED AS PARQUET TBLPROPERTIES('parquet.compression'='SNAPPY')

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS DW.dim_customer ( customer_id int, customer_code string, customer_short string, customer_firstname string, customer_lastname string, customer_name string, customer_email string, customer_cash_type string, customer_cash_type_val string, customer_currency string, customer_telephone string, customer_fax string, customer_status string, customer_status_val string, customer_company_name string, customer_saler_user_id int, customer_cser_user_id int, customer_bill_date timestamp, customer_signature string, customer_reg_time timestamp, customer_note string, customer_value decimal(18,4), customer_credit_line decimal(18,4), customer_cb_update_time timestamp, customer_financial_customer_code string, customer_product_verify string, customer_subscribe_message string, customer_frozen_status string, customer_email_subscribe_checked string, customer_register_source string, customer_sign_body string, customer_ae_customer_code string, customer_verify_time timestamp, customer_versions timestamp, customer_update_time timestamp ) STORED AS PARQUET TBLPROPERTIES('parquet.compression'='SNAPPY')

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS DW.dim_employee_department ( ed_id INT, ed_name STRING, ed_name_en STRING, ed_sort TINYINT, ed_supervisor_id INT ) STORED AS PARQUET TBLPROPERTIES('parquet.compression'='SNAPPY')

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS DW.dim_employee_position ( ed_key string, epl_key string, ep_id int, ep_name string, ep_name_en string, ep_ud_id int, ep_upl_id tinyint, ep_remarks string, ep_upl_name string, ep_upl_name_en string ) STORED AS PARQUET TBLPROPERTIES('parquet.compression'='SNAPPY')

create table IF NOT EXISTS DW.dim_product( customer_key string, product_id int, product_sku string, product_barcode string, product_reference_no string, product_customer_code string, product_customer_id int, product_title_en string, product_title string, product_declared_name string, product_status tinyint, product_status_val string, product_sale_status tinyint, product_sale_status_val string, product_receive_status tinyint, product_receive_status_val string, product_hs_code string, product_currency_code string, product_pu_code string, product_length decimal(10,2), product_width decimal(5,2), product_height decimal(10,2), product_net_weight decimal(10,3), product_weight decimal(10,3), product_sales_value decimal(10,2), product_purchase_value decimal(10,2), product_declared_value decimal(10,2), product_is_qc tinyint, product_is_qc_val string, product_barcode_type tinyint, product_barcode_type_val string, product_type tinyint, product_type_val string, product_pc_id int, product_pce_id string, product_add_time timestamp, product_update_time timestamp, product_have_asn tinyint, product_pd_id int, product_product_attribute tinyint, product_product_attribute_val string, product_buyer_id int, product_warning_qty int, product_package_type string, product_package_type_val string, product_is_shared_sign string, product_is_shared_sign_val string, product_shared_unit_price decimal(10,2), product_describe string, product_shared_time timestamp, product_reason string, product_customs_code string, product_declared_name_zh string, product_create_type string, product_is_thirdpart tinyint, product_is_thirdpart_val string, product_thirdpart_platform string, product_relation_barcode string, product_mark_weight decimal(10,3), product_mark_length decimal(10,2), product_mark_width decimal(5,2), product_mark_height decimal(10,2), product_real_weight decimal(10,3), product_real_height decimal(10,2), product_real_width decimal(10,2), product_real_length decimal(10,2), product_abnormal_time timestamp, product_oms_add_time timestamp, product_material string, product_brand string, product_model string, product_function string, product_versions timestamp, product_is_irregular tinyint, product_is_irregular_val string, product_irregular_values string, product_company_code string, product_desc string, product_category_id int, product_category_first_id int, product_category_first_id_name string, product_category_first_id_name_en string, product_category_second_id int, product_category_second_id_name string, product_category_second_id_name_en string, product_category_third_id int, product_category_third_id_name string, product_category_third_id_name_en string, product_category_lang string, product_category_lang_val string, product_sync_to_wms int, product_barcode_info string, product_UnitId int, product_ProductUrl string, product_IsBrand tinyint, product_IsBrand_val string, product_IsDeployControl tinyint, product_IsDeployControl_val string, product_ReVerifyStatus tinyint, product_ReVerifyStatus_val string, product_Remark string, product_dm_length decimal(10,2), product_dm_width decimal(10,2), product_dm_height decimal(10,2), product_dm_weight decimal(10,3) ) STORED AS PARQUET TBLPROPERTIES('parquet.compression'='SNAPPY');

create table IF NOT EXISTS DW.dim_shipping_method ( warehouse_key string, sc_key string, st_key string, sct_key string, sm_transfer_warehouse_key string, sm_id int, sm_code string, sm_short_name string, sm_name_cn string, sm_name string, sm_pg_code string, sm_mp_fee decimal(10,2), sm_reg_fee decimal(10,2), sm_addons decimal(10,2), sm_type tinyint, sm_type_val string, sm_baf decimal(10,2), sm_discount decimal(10,2), sm_delivery_time_min string, sm_delivery_time_max string, sm_delivery_time_avg string, sm_is_volume tinyint, sm_is_volume_val string, sm_is_charge tinyint, sm_is_charge_val string, sm_vol_rate decimal(15,4), sm_status tinyint, sm_status_val string, sm_class_code string, sm_class_code_val string, sm_logo string, sm_return_recipient string, sm_return_address string, sm_discount_min decimal(10,2), sm_mp_fee_min decimal(10,2), sm_reg_fee_min decimal(10,2), sm_limit_volume int, sm_limit_weight decimal(10,3), sm_sort tinyint, sm_is_tracking tinyint, sm_is_tracking_val string, sm_is_signature tinyint, sm_is_signature_val string, sm_is_insurance tinyint, sm_is_insurance_val string, sm_is_validate_remote tinyint, sm_is_validate_remote_val string, sm_warehouse_id int, sm_calc_type tinyint, sm_fee_type tinyint, sm_sc_id int, sm_st_id int, sm_carrier_number string, sm_allow_letter tinyint, sm_allow_letter_val string, sm_sct_id int, sm_update_time timestamp, sm_pre_generate_label tinyint, sm_pre_generate_label_val string, sm_code_type tinyint, sm_code_type_val string, sm_is_more_box tinyint, sm_is_more_box_val string, sm_return_type tinyint, sm_attribute string, sm_attribute_val string, sm_is_claim tinyint, sm_is_claim_val string, sm_transfer_warehouse_id int, sm_age_detection tinyint, sm_age_detection_val string, sm_recommend_platform string, sm_volume_unit string, sm_volume_type tinyint, sm_volume_type_val string, sm_volume_value decimal(10,2), sm_weight_unit string, sm_weight_type tinyint, sm_weight_type_val string, sm_weight_value decimal(10,2), sm_claim_desc string, sm_sfp_label_type tinyint, sm_sfp_label_type_val string, sm_life_gate tinyint, sm_life_gate_val string, sm_truck tinyint, sm_truck_val string ) STORED AS PARQUET TBLPROPERTIES('parquet.compression'='SNAPPY');
